cotrollers

类 WebScraping

  • java.lang.Object
    • cotrollers.WebScraping

  • public class WebScraping
extends java.lang.Object
    this class aim at scraping the target web and get useful information from it using regular expression.
    作者:
    OuyangYicheng

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      (专用程序包) java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> OthersLL 
      (专用程序包) java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> TimeLL

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      private void addOtherData(java.lang.String result)
      Scrap the data id, latitude, longitude, depth, magnitude and region from the String result, then generate a String containing those data, and add it to the LinkedList OthersLL.
      private void addTimeData(java.lang.String result)
      Scrap the time data from the String result, then generate a String containing those data, and add it to the LinkedList TimeLL.
      private void GetData(int pagenum)
      Scrap the data of time, id, latitude, longitude, depth, magnitude and region from the certain page of the web site "https://www.emsc-csem.org"
      java.sql.Timestamp getEarliest()
      Get the earliest data from the web and return its time as a Timestamp.
      java.sql.Timestamp getLatest()
      Get the latest data from the web and return its time as a Timestamp.
      java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> getOthersLL()
      get the LinkedList containing the data of infomation except time.
      private java.sql.Timestamp getTime(java.lang.String time)
      Change the String with the format of "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss" into a Timestamp with the same time information.
      java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> getTimeLL()
      get the LinkedList containing the data of time.
      private java.util.regex.Matcher RegexString(java.lang.String targetStr, java.lang.String patternStr)
      To search useful information from pattern text using regular expression, and return a object of class Matcher.
      private java.lang.String SendGet(java.lang.String url)
      This method scrap the source code of the web site of the url, then return it as a string.

        public WebScraping(int pagenum)

    • 方法详细资料

      • getTimeLL

        public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> getTimeLL()
        get the LinkedList containing the data of time.
        返回:
        LinkedList containing the data of time.

      • getOthersLL

        public java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> getOthersLL()
        get the LinkedList containing the data of infomation except time.
        返回:
        LinkedList containing the data of infomation except time.

      • getLatest

        public java.sql.Timestamp getLatest()
        Get the latest data from the web and return its time as a Timestamp.
        返回:
        The latest time of the data in the web.

      • getEarliest

        public java.sql.Timestamp getEarliest()
        Get the earliest data from the web and return its time as a Timestamp.
        返回:
        The earliest time of the data in the web.

      • getTime

        private java.sql.Timestamp getTime(java.lang.String time)
        Change the String with the format of "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss" into a Timestamp with the same time information.
        参数:
        time - - the target String.
        返回:
        The timestamp result.

      • SendGet

        private java.lang.String SendGet(java.lang.String url)
        This method scrap the source code of the web site of the url, then return it as a string.
        参数:
        url - - the url of the web we want to scrap.
        返回:
        The source code we get.

      • RegexString

        private java.util.regex.Matcher RegexString(java.lang.String targetStr,
                                            java.lang.String patternStr)
        To search useful information from pattern text using regular expression, and return a object of class Matcher.
        参数:
        targetStr - - the regular expression used for searching.
        patternStr - - the pattern text we get data from.
        返回:
        the Matcher contains the result of matching.

      • GetData

        private void GetData(int pagenum)
        Scrap the data of time, id, latitude, longitude, depth, magnitude and region from the certain page of the web site "https://www.emsc-csem.org"
        参数:
        pagenum - - the page number users want to search.

      • addTimeData

        private void addTimeData(java.lang.String result)
        Scrap the time data from the String result, then generate a String containing those data, and add it to the LinkedList TimeLL.
        参数:
        result - - The pattern text used to search for data.

      • addOtherData

        private void addOtherData(java.lang.String result)
        Scrap the data id, latitude, longitude, depth, magnitude and region from the String result, then generate a String containing those data, and add it to the LinkedList OthersLL.
        参数:
        result - - The pattern text used to search for data.
